en.title: Introduction
en.subtitle: ğŸ‘‹ Who Am I and What I Do
en.description: Hello! ğŸ‘‹ I'm a full stack web developer with 2 years of experience in the industry. During this time, I've had the opportunity to work at Inside One, an Argentine company specialized in projects that use artificial intelligence, React, and Firebase to solve problems and collect data. ğŸ¤–

en.title: Projects
en.subtitle: ğŸŒŸ My Work Experience
en.description: At Inside One, I've been involved in a wide range of exciting projects. For example, I worked on the development of an application for user sentiment analysis, where we collect user emotions and present them in metrics and tables. I also collaborated on the creation of a training application based on attached documentation, which allows training agents based on questions, showing metrics, and ratings. Additionally, I participated in the design and development of chatbots to create virtual assistants through platforms like WhatsApp and Telegram. ğŸ’¬

en.title: Focus
en.subtitle: ğŸ¯ My Focus
en.description: My focus in web development is on keeping code clean and following best practices. I use technologies such as Node.js, Express, Nest, Firebase, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB to integrate databases securely and efficiently. Furthermore, I'm skilled in creating and styling components in React and CSS, as well as bug resolution and reusable code creation. ğŸ› ï¸

en.title: Experience
en.subtitle: ğŸ” Learning Journey
en.description: My experience at Plataforma 5, where I participated in a rigorous 4-month programming bootcamp and a 3-month part-time acceleration period, has taught me the importance of teamwork, perseverance, and continuous learning. I'm always looking for opportunities to improve my skills and knowledge in web development. Additionally, I self-taught for a year on FreeCodeCamp in Responsive Web Design, JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures, and Front End Development Libraries, as well as received front-end training at Alura Latam.
